quote_first: Trying to identify the key facts, Ethan was suddenly aware he was looking at the wall clock; it was
quote_last:
.
“Wait a minute. When did you hear about this?”
There was a tiny moment of hesitation. “The first news came in just before five.”
title: The Infinite Day
author: Chris Walley

quote_first: I told him that it was me and he said, “It’s
quote_last: on a Sunday morning. This is terribly inconsiderate of you. I realize you’re besotted with Marigold, but you must try and restrain your passion. Come to lunch. I’ve got something to show you.”
title: Adrian Mole and the Weapons of Mass Destruction
author: Sue Townsend

quote_last: Ishigami left his apartment as he did every weekday morning.
title: The Devotion of Duspect X
